CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 22, 1945, pg. 27, reads: "BOND CLUB SCORES - Miss Bernice Irwings is admiring the sleek hairdo of Mrs. Philip Littlejohn. These two attractive models will be featured at the cabaret dance and fashion revue sponsored by the Bond Club at the Palomar Ballroom, Dec. 27. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bernice Irwings wearing knot-shaped hat, and Ethel Lewis Littlejohn wearing pinstriped suit, posed in front of leaf patterned curtain in Harris Studio
